snippet: Charles Sonder stepped between combatants on a No. 6 train, a video reached YouTube, and soon he had fame and a new nickname.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on sudden YouTube fame of Charles Sonder, who deliberately planted himself between combatants on a New York City subway car, calmly defusing the situation until the fight dwindled to a sputter.
lead_paragraph: Charles Sonder stepped between combatants on a No. 6 train, a video reached YouTube, and soon he had fame and a new nickname.

headline.seo: Stopping a Subway Fight Wins Internet Fame for ‘Snackman’
headline.main: When Fists and Kicks Fly on the Subway, It’s Snackman to the Rescue
headline.print_headline: When Fists and Kicks Fly on the Subway, It’s Snackman to the Rescue
